channel.title: The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue
channel.description:
Basically, I can't find what's wrong with my start. I haven't made a server in ages. wanted to get back into it, I can't get my start working with the issue, it's something to do with the directry of Java right? But I can't remember how to fix it, I've tried editing it etc
Getting - [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
My directory for the My JDK = C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin
Thanks

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“bhill, post:3, topic:440606”]Already fixed it lol was doing the wrong directory. was doing JDK rather than JRE.[/quote]You’re supposed to do JDK…

Read full topic
